import { useState } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom" const IndividualPost = (props) =>{ const history = useHistory(); const loadedPosts = props.loadedPosts const postId = props.postId const index = props.index const [viewClicked, setViewClicked] = useState(false) const handleViewClicked = (event) =>{ event.preventDefault() setViewClicked(true) console.log(postId) console.log(index) console.log(loadedPosts[index]) } return ( viewClicked ?

{loadedPosts[index].title}

{loadedPosts[index].author.username}

{loadedPosts[index].createdAt}

{loadedPosts[index].price}

{loadedPosts[index].description}

{loadedPosts[index].location}

{loadedPosts[index].willDeliver}

:
) } export default IndividualPost
